images.caption: Figure 1:Radar plot showing ConceptARC competencies betweenVDMsandLLMs, GPT-4 [IC] is added for additional reference.

Table 1:ARC-AGI test performance. Following the official evaluation protocolChollet et al. (2024), models are evaluated with two attempts per test input. We also report single-attempt results for comparability with commercial LLMs, which are only available under this setting.
